title: Strengthening Hospitality Practical Competencies: Academic Information Utilization Program for Prospective Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in basic academic research, understanding of fundamental science curriculum concepts
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can effectively search for science-related research papers in academic databases and select them with over 80% accuracy by applying credibility criteria.
Learners can evaluate the bias and source reliability of scientific information using three or more analytical criteria.
Learners can integrate academic information to design science educational materials in a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) project and improve them through peer assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
